name: Train Simulator: BR Class 24 Loco Add-On
summary: As the first diesel locomotives to be built at BR's Darlington Works, the Class 24 was built as part of the British Rail Modernisation Plan in the late 1950s. The Class 24 was a Sulzer Type 2, Bo-Bo diesel-electric locomotive built between 1958 and 1961, incorporating numerous elements such as off-the-shelf standardised components used...
